sql: select * from (select jtid,jtly,wjfl,no as jcbh,name as jcmc,url as wjlj,creator as scry,cjsj as scsj,expire_date as yxqx2,(select lrr from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum =1) as fpr,(select lrsj from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum = 1) as fpsj,(select fp_flg from zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum = 1) as fpflg,(select count(jcbh) from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no) as sffp,rcnt FROM v_zxjc_t_jstc) m where (m.fpflg = 'N' or m.sffp=0)
sql_cnt: select count(m.jcbh) from (select jtly,wjfl,no as jcbh,name as jcmc,url as wjlj,creator as scry,cjsj as scsj,expire_date as yxqx2,(select lrr from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum =1) as fpr,(select lrsj from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum = 1) as fpsj,(select fp_flg from zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no and    rownum = 1) as fpflg,(select count(jcbh) from   zxjc_t_jstc where  jcbh = v_zxjc_t_jstc.no) as sffp FROM v_zxjc_t_jstc) m where (m.fpflg = 'N' or m.sffp=0)
sql_orderby: order by m.scsj desc nulls last
